WorkItem.ClosedComment: Grammar is just a demo. Will rewrite it in the future
WorkItem.Summary: Array definition bug in sample C# grammar

Comments.Message:
I know, I noticed it before, the grammar is crap, intended to be just a demo. I tweaked the original version from spec a lot, and not sure if it is error in original (there are quite a few there for sure), or result of my tweaking. 
Anyhow, I would welcome some help with this. Can you (or somebody else?) start c# grammar from scratch and translate one-to-one the spec grammar, including LINQ stuff? Would really appreciate the help. I'm planning to use this grammar as a test pad for non-canonical parsing algorithm, that supposed to be much better at conflict resolution.
thanks
Roman
